title: Silver 2 ADC/SUP main LF duo
body:
yo im jayden i have had alot of weird games lately, i would like one less ragey 16 year old on my team for once :)  im a pretty passive person i barely use chat unless its objective wise other then that i dont see a point to it. Id like someone in silver 3+ but if you got the skill you got the drill. 
add me in game and we can duo or have a norm :)
